item.title: 风险投资公司将二级股票出售视为并购衰退时的新出路
item.description: 在交易活动乏善可陈的情况下，风险投资公司正在出售私人股票。但首先...【原文：Venture capital firms are selling private stock amid lackluster deal activity. But first...】

item.title: Archegos 的 Hwang 因震惊华尔街的罪行面临判决
item.description: Archegos 资本管理公司（Archegos Capital Management）创始人比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）将于周三因涉嫌欺诈和操纵市场而被判刑，这与其价值 360 亿美元的家族办公室在 2021 年令人震惊的倒闭有关，为这起震惊华尔街的案件画上了句号。【原文：Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang will be sentenced Wednesday for fraud and market manipulation tied to the stunning 2021 collapse of his $36 billion family office, capping a case that riveted Wall Street.】

item.title: 美联储独立的根基削弱了特朗普寻求摇摆的努力
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们将探讨美联储独立性的根源，有人担心未来几年美联储的独立性可能面临风险。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the roots of Fed independence, which some fear may be at risk in coming years. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易团队的领导人选悬而未决
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布提名霍华德-卢特尼克为商务部长，并 "领导我们的关税和贸易议程"，这为他即将上任的内阁揭开了一个谜团。但不是谁将真正监督即将上任的特朗普政府的贸易政策。【原文：With his announcement that Howard Lutnick will be his nominee for Commerce Secretary and “lead our Tariff and Trade agenda,” US president-elect Donald Trump shed a little light on one mystery hanging over his incoming cabinet. Just not the one over who will really oversee trade policy in the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行利率明显走低，但仍需谨慎行事
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲央行将进一步降低利率，这一点 "非常明确"，但由于贸易紧张局势加剧和全球冲突等不确定因素，官员们不应仓促行事。【原文：It’s “crystal clear” that European Central Bank interest rates will be reduced further but officials shouldn’t rush the process due to uncertainties including rising trade tensions and global conflicts, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 迈阿密公寓大王扩大赌注 财富热潮向佛罗里达海岸蔓延
item.description: 豪尔赫-佩雷斯在迈阿密建造豪华公寓，成为亿万富翁。现在，他正计划在佛罗里达州的一个海滨小镇建造一座耗资 10 亿美元的高楼，该小镇以简朴的退休人员住宅和公寓而闻名。【原文：Jorge Perez became a billionaire building luxury condos in Miami. Now he’s planning a $1 billion tower in a seaside Florida town better known for no-frills retiree homes and apartments.】

item.title: 顾问称印度热门城市房价飙升 23
item.description: 据房地产咨询公司 ANAROCK 称，由于对豪华单元房的需求不断增加，推动了整体房地产价格的上涨，因此在印度主要城市购房的成本变得更高。【原文：Buying homes in major Indian cities has become costlier as rising demand for luxury units has boosted overall property prices, according to real estate consultancy firm ANAROCK.】

item.title: 维罗纳足球俱乐部成为得克萨斯州投资者的目标
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利维罗纳足球队是一群美国投资者的潜在收购目标。【原文：Italian football team Hellas Verona is a potential takeover target for a group of US-based investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 今年涨幅达 200% 后，英伟达设定了更高标准
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）第三季度财报对股市短期走向的影响有多大，怎么强调都不为过。这家芯片制造商是全球最大的公司，今年股价翻了三倍，市值达到 3.6 万亿美元，它是投资者对与人工智能增长相关的财富狂热梦想的化身。【原文：It’s hard to overstate how big Nvidia’s third-quarter earnings are for the short-term direction of the stock market. The chipmaker is the world’s biggest company, with a $3.6 trillion market value after the stock tripled this year, and it’s the embodiment of investors’ fever dreams of riches tied to the growth of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财富基金被要求增加国内资产投资
item.description: 根据政府发布的一项新授权，澳大利亚主权财富基金必须将更多资金投入国内住房、能源和基础设施项目。【原文：Australia’s sovereign wealth fund will be required to invest more money in domestic housing, energy and infrastructure projects under a new mandate issued by the government.】

item.title: 阿斯利康失去 "独熊"，瑞银在中国股市下跌后上调其评级
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）最近的股价一路下跌，以至于该医药股已经摆脱了分析师最后的看跌评级。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc’s recent share-price rout has gone so far that the pharma stock has shaken off the last of its bearish analyst ratings.】

item.title: 丛林深处，病毒猎手正在努力阻止下一次大流行
item.description:
"科维德-19 "事件发生五年后，各国政府正依靠由雅培支持的远程发烧诊所来发现未来的威胁。【原文：

Five years after Covid-19, governments are relying on remote fever clinics supported by Abbott to spot future threats.

】

item.title: 拜登在委内瑞拉问题上的举动让特朗普几乎没有达成协议的余地
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗希望在唐纳德-特朗普的领导下与美国 "重新开始"。然而，他得到的却是似曾相识的感觉。【原文：Nicolás Maduro was hoping for a “fresh start” with the US under Donald Trump. Instead, he’s getting déjà vu.】

item.title: 孩之宝游戏公司首席执行官出售电影业务后重新专注于游戏业务
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro Inc.首席执行官克里斯-考克斯（Chris Cocks）在纽约一家桌游咖啡馆打开两包公司的《魔法：集结》（Magic: The Gathering）扑克牌时，难掩失望之情。【原文：Hasbro Inc. Chief Executive Officer Chris Cocks couldn’t hide his disappointment when he opened two packs of his company’s Magic: The Gathering playing cards at a board-game cafė in New York.】

item.title: 英国租金通胀率七个月来首次回升
item.description: 英国私人房租通胀率七个月来首次回升，首都地区的通胀率再次达到两位数，延长了租户的生活成本压力。【原文：UK private rental inflation picked up for the first time in seven months and hit double digits again in the capital, prolonging a cost-of-living squeeze on tenants.】

item.title: 英伟达交易员为潜在的 3,000 亿美元收益变动做好准备
item.description: 作为全球最有价值的公司，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）将公布一份异常复杂的季度报告，交易员们正在为可能出现的巨大股价波动做准备。【原文：With Nvidia Corp. due to report an unusually complex quarter as the world’s most valuable company, traders are preparing for a potentially mammoth stock swing.】

item.title: 迪拜家族办公室目前管理着超过 1 万亿美元的资产
item.description: 在过去几年高净值人士大量涌入的推动下，迪拜的金融中心现已成为控制着超过 1 万亿美元资产的家族办公室的所在地。【原文：Dubai’s financial hub is now home to family offices that control over $1 trillion in assets, driven by the influx of high-net worth individuals over the past few years.】

item.title: 电力需求下降，埃及最后一刻推迟进口液化天然气
item.description: 埃及今年以大规模液化天然气招标出乎市场意料，但本月却突然拒绝了几批进口货物。【原文：Egypt, which surprised the market with massive liquefied natural gas tenders this year, has abruptly turned away several imported cargoes this month.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长飙升，欧洲央行降息面临考验
item.description: 一项衡量欧元区工资水平的重要指标创下了自共同货币发行以来的最大涨幅；随着通胀的缓解，欧洲中央银行的降息计划也变得更加复杂。【原文：A key gauge of euro-zone wages jumped by the most since the common currency was introduced — complicating the European Central Bank’s plans for interest-rate cuts as inflation eases.】

item.title: S.非洲商业情绪升至 2022 年以来最佳水平
item.description: 由于持续的电力供应和政治稳定为更好的商业环境提供了支持，南非的商业景气上升至 2022 年第一季度以来的最高水平。【原文：South African business sentiment rose its highest level since the first quarter of 2022, as constant electricity supply and political stability supported better business conditions.】

item.title: 石油交易商认为特朗普的外交政策对原油不利
item.description: 石油长期以来的地缘政治风险溢价已经消失，因为交易商认为唐纳德-特朗普的外交政策议程不利于石油需求和价格。【原文：Oil’s longstanding geopolitical risk premium has evaporated as traders interpret Donald Trump’s foreign policy agenda as bearish for oil demand — and prices.】

item.title: 德国在政治僵局中提高有争议的天然气税
item.description: 德国天然气市场管理公司表示，在政治动荡导致德国议会无法及时取消天然气储存费之后，该公司将提高饱受诟病的天然气储存费。【原文：Germany’s natural-gas market manager said it will increase a heavily criticized storage fee after political turmoil prevented the country’s parliament from scrapping the levy in time.】

item.title: Equinor 首席财务官认为欧洲天然气市场将进入冬季
item.description: Equinor ASA 首席财务官 Torgrim Reitan 表示，进入冬季后，欧洲天然气市场将趋于紧张。【原文：Equinor ASA sees a tight European natural gas market going into winter, said Chief Financial Officer Torgrim Reitan.】

item.title: 天达交易后，资管公司寻求更多基金融资合作
item.description: Ares Alternative Credit 常务董事 Richard Sehayek 表示，继最近与天达银行（Investec Bank Plc）合作之后，Ares Management Corp. 正在探索与其他金融机构合作，以扩大其在基金融资市场的服务范围。【原文：Ares Management Corp. is exploring partnerships with other financial institutions, following its recent tie-up with Investec Bank Plc, to expand its offering in the fund finance market, according to Richard Sehayek, managing director of Ares Alternative Credit.】

item.title: 大众汽车劳工领袖在谈判前提出 15 亿欧元的削减方案
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）的工会领导人提出削减 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的成本，因为管理层正在推动广泛的节约，以稳定这家陷入困境的汽车制造商。【原文：Labor leaders at Volkswagen AG offered €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) in cost cuts as management pushes for broad savings to steady the beleaguered carmaker.】

item.title: 特斯拉董事长在大选后抛售 3500 万美元股票
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.董事长罗宾-登霍尔姆（Robyn Denholm）本月适时出售股票，从美国大选后飙升的股票中获利超过 3500 万美元。【原文：Tesla Inc. Chair Robyn Denholm cashed in from a well-timed sale of shares this month, reaping more than $35 million from stock that soared after the US election.】

item.title: 抛弃基准，新兴市场明星选股人获得美国式回报
item.description: 罗布-马歇尔-李（Rob Marshall-Lee）是少数几位通过投资新兴市场公司获得类似美国股市回报的基金经理之一。他的做法是避开大多数公司。【原文：Rob Marshall-Lee is among the few money managers generating US stock market-like returns with investments in emerging-market companies. He does it by avoiding most of them.】

item.title: 赛奇宣布回购 4 亿英镑后股价创下新高
item.description: 英国软件公司赛捷集团（Sage Group Plc）宣布了一项高达 4 亿英镑（约合 5.08 亿美元）的股票回购计划，反映了其所谓的强劲财务状况，随后该公司股价一跃创下历史新高。【原文：Sage Group Plc jumped to a record high after the UK software company announced a share buyback plan of as much as £400 million ($508 million) reflecting what it called a strong financial position.】

item.title: 伦敦放弃伊丽莎白线地铁服务的香港运营商
item.description: 伦敦旗舰地铁线的运营权将从一家香港公司转交给一家日本财团。【原文：The running of London’s flagship metro line will be switched away from a Hong Kong company to a Japanese consortium.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称贸易加剧欧元区金融稳定风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行警告说，贸易摩擦加剧给欧元区经济带来了额外风险，并有可能扩大该地区金融体系的脆弱性。【原文：Rising trade frictions pose an additional risk to the euro-area economy and threaten to amplify vulnerabilities in the region’s financial system, the European Central Bank warned.】
